attributes.action: Overturn the result of the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: A referendum of such importance should be subject to much more rigorous scrutiny than an ordinary Parliamentary Election – because it is non-reversible.  A document, overseen by an independent, non-partisan body should have been produced containing accurate information from both sides and made available to the electorate so that they could have made a properly informed decision.
attributes.background: Many people now wish that they had not voted Leave in the EU referendum and feel they have been mislead by the untruths and exaggerations of the leave campaign.This petition is a vehicle for such people to express their desire to change their mind.
